program main

implicit none

integer :: n, k, x, i, a, j, m, temp

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: bb, aa

! Read first part's input

read*, n, k

allocate(bb(0:n-1))

allocate(aa(0:n-1))

do i =0, n-1

   read*, bb(i)

end do

! Initialize aa to 0, m=0

aa = 0

m =0

! Process the first part

do a = n-1, 0, -1

   j =0

   do while (bb(a) >0)

      if (aa(j) >= a +k) then

         bb(a) = bb(a) -1

      end if

      j = j +1

   end do

   ! Now, shift elements from m down to j+1 to the right

   temp = m

   m = m +1

   do i = temp, j+1, -1

      aa(i) = aa(i-1)

   end do

   aa(j) = a

end do

! Get x from first element of aa plus 1

x = aa(0) +1

! Process second part

if (x /=2 .and. mod(x,2) ==0) then

   x =x +1

end if

do while (.true.)

   integer :: sqrt_x = int(sqrt(real(x)))

   integer :: i

   i =3

   do while (i <= sqrt_x)

      if (mod(x,i) ==0) then

         exit

      end if

      i =i +2

   end do

   if (i > sqrt_x) then

      exit

   else

      x =x +2

   end if

end do

! Output the result

print*, x

deallocate(bb, aa)

end program main
